query:
(call_expression
  function: (selector_expression
    operand: (call_expression
      function: (selector_expression
        operand: (identifier)
        field: (field_identifier))
      arguments: (argument_list))
    field: (field_identifier))
  arguments: (argument_list
    .
    (_)
    .
    (interpreted_string_literal) @flag.name
    .
    (_) @flag.default
    .
    (interpreted_string_literal) @flag.help))

; fmt.Println("...")  (interpreted string)
(
  (call_expression
    function: (selector_expression
      operand: (identifier) @pkg
      field: (field_identifier) @fn)
    arguments: (argument_list
      (interpreted_string_literal) @msg))
  (#eq? @pkg "fmt")
  (#eq? @fn "Println")
) @call

; fmt.Println(`...`)  (raw string)
(
  (call_expression
    function: (selector_expression
      operand: (identifier) @pkg
      field: (field_identifier) @fn)
    arguments: (argument_list
      (raw_string_literal) @msg))
  (#eq? @pkg "fmt")
  (#eq? @fn "Println")
) @call
